creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
description: mirror, with scrolled frame and inlaid designs at cresting and base; mirror in two parts; upper section with rustic scene printed in white, black and gold; mirror proper is edged with dull gold molding and rectangular part of frame displays narrow line of ebony and satinwood inlays
medium: Mahogany and light colored wood inlays with reverse painting on glass
title: Mirror
